product_name: Thule Artificial Rain Gutters - Package of 4
long_description: These brackets let you attach Thule rain gutter racks to your vehicle even if you don't have rain gutters where you need them. Artificial rain gutters can be bolted to top or side of roof; perfect for use on truck canopies. Rain gutter rack components sold separately. Sold in a package of 4.
short_description: These brackets let you attach Thule rain gutter racks to your vehicle even if you don't have rain gutters where you need them.
